sqlite-explorer.config.maxFileSize.markd:
Maximum file size in MB that the extension will attempt to open. Set to 0 to disable the limit. The hard limit is 4GB, but your system may have lower limits.

__Warning__: Large files may cause performance issues or freezes.
sqlite-explorer.commands.refresh.title: Refresh Database
sqlite-explorer.config.instantCommit.mar:
Controls when changes are committed immediately to the database. When enabled, modifications are saved instantly without requiring a manual save.

__Warning__: Instant commits use reverse SQL statements for undo/redo, which may not work in all scenarios (e.g., if another process modified the same row).
sqlite-explorer.config.doubleClickBehavi:
Controls what happens when you double-click a cell in the table view.

- **Modal Dialog**: Opens a modal dialog to edit the cell (default)
- **VS Code Editor**: Opens the cell value in a separate VS Code tab
